data.text: Dizayn Pack, one of the leading companies in plastic and aseptic packaging industry combining its advanced technology with its sectoral experience, meets the increasing expectations of the industry with its specialized staff and follows the innovations closely. Having 100% national capital, the company provides service almost 80% of the national and foreign brands in Turkey. With an more than 50-million investment in ÃerkezkÃ¶y and Esenyurt facilities, Dizayn Pack exports to 24 countries in Europe, Arabian Peninsula, Middle East and North Africa and continues to grow fast in overseas market.
